winRate.description: Optional win rate of the game.

v1alpha1Game.description: Represents a game with various attributes.

v1alpha1GameCategory.description:
Represents the category of a game.

 - GAME_CATEGORY_UNSPECIFIED: Default value. This value is unused.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_SLOT: Slot games.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_LIVE: Live games.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_SPORT: Sports games.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_FISH: Fish games.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_LOTTERY: Lottery games.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_POKER: Poker games.
 - GAME_CATEGORY_OTHER: Other types of games.

isSuccess.description: Indicates if the login was successful.

token.description: The token generated upon successful login.

url.description: The URL to redirect to after successful login.

v1alpha1GameLoginResponse.description: GameLoginResponse is the response message for a game login request.

v1alpha1GameProvider.description:
Represents the provider of a game.

 - GAME_PROVIDER_UNSPECIFIED: Default value. This value is unused.
 - GAME_PROVIDER_JOKER: Joker game provider.

v1alpha1GameRoundStatus.description:
GameRoundStatus represents the status of a game round.

 - GAME_ROUND_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: The status is unspecified.
 - GAME_ROUND_STATUS_SUCCESS: The game round was successful.
 - GAME_ROUND_STATUS_CANCELLED: The game round was cancelled.
 - GAME_ROUND_STATUS_SETTLED: The game round was settled.

isSuccess.description: Indicates if the signout was successful.

v1alpha1GameSignoutResponse.description: GameSignoutResponse is the response message for a game signout request.

v1alpha1GameStatus.description:
Represents the status of a game.

 - GAME_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default value. This value is unused.
 - GAME_STATUS_ACTIVE: The game is currently active and available for play.
 - GAME_STATUS_MAINTENANCE: The game is under maintenance and temporarily unavailable.
 - GAME_STATUS_CLOSED: The game is permanently closed and unavailable.

isSuccess.description: Indicates if the request was successful.

url.description: An optional URL with more details about the game round.

v1alpha1GetGameDetailResponse.description: GetGameDetailResponse is the response message for a game detail request.

nextPageToken.description: The token for the next page of results.

totalSize.description: The total number of games available.

v1alpha1GetGameListResponse.description: GetGameListResponse is the response message for a game list request.

status.description: The status of the game round.

amount.description: The amount associated with the game round.

v1alpha1GetGameRoundStatusResponse.description: GetGameRoundStatusResponse is the response message for a game round status request.
